title: Open Tues 7:20-7:35pm, 1BR/1BA H/W Flrs(2440 8th Ave #3)
posting_body: ['1st', 'Floor 1BR/1BA', '* $2,295/month annual lease', '*', 'Available:', 'Now', 'OPEN HOUSE: Tuesday(8/2)', '7:20pm-7:35pm', 'Address: 2440 - 8th Avenue #3', "Elegant, contemporary 1BR/1BA apartment in Oakland's Ivy Hill neighborhood.", 'Floors are pale hardwood except in bath.', 'Living room is bright, sunny and has a storage closet.', 'Open living room has kitchen in one corner.', 'Stainless appliances include electric stove and microwave.', 'There is a breakfast bar for two-three.', 'Bedroom has a lit closet with sliding mirror doors.', 'Bath has shower-over-tub.', 'Building is in a very residential neighborhood on 2440 - 8th Avenue at Beatie Street.', "Tenant pays a one-time broker's fee.", 'Everest Mwamba', 'DRE# 01717299', 'Kenney & Everest Real Estate', 'DRE# 01984640', 'show contact info', 'office', 'Apply at KenneyandEverest .', 'com', 'Leasing and Real Estate: Our Family Business for Over 100 Years.', 'This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.']
